message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please track and compile the average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, for the period from January 2022 to April 2025 (including January 2022 and April 2025). Please cite all the statistics from government websites.

Please output the compiled data in one Markdown table format. The column names in the table should be, in order: Month, House Price in England (Pounds), House Price in Wales (Pounds), House Price in Scotland (Pounds), House Price in Northern Ireland (Pounds)
For the column 'Month', list the month in the format 2022/01, 2022/02.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

<think>
I need to gather historical house price data for each region from January 2022 to April 2025. I'll start with searching for official sources of such data.
</think>
<search>average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland from January 2022 to April 2025</search>

Search query: average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland from January 2022 to April 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.statista.com/statistics/285705/monthly-house-price-index-in-the-united-kingdom-uk/?srsltid=AfmBOorPemHAL9weH9Zn2l5BswsLWdCzn_xhIecQSDiz99i1w666jTnW):
Monthly house price index in the UK 2015-2025 - Statista The house price index (HPI) shows changes in the value of residential properties in England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.

[Doc 2](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/bulletins/privaterentandhousepricesuk/december2025):
Private rent and house prices, UK - Office for National Statistics Average house prices increased to £292,000 (1.4%) in England, £211,000 (1.5%) in Wales, and £192,000 (3.3%) in Scotland, in the 12 months to ...

[Doc 3](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry As of October 2025, the average house price in the UK is £269,862, and the index stands at 103.4. Property prices have fallen by 0.1% compared to the ...

The most specific source is not immediately found, but the key is identifying where reliable data might be consolidated. Let's refine our search focusing on direct governmental sources for continuous data.
</think>
<search>governmental sources for house price indices England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland</search>

Search query: governmental sources for house price indices England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-house-price-index-reports):
UK House Price Index: reports - GOV.UK Reports for the UK House Price Index (UK HPI) for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, including in CSV format. From: HM Land Registry; Published: 14 ...

[Doc 2](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/about-the-uk-house-price-index):
UK House Price Index - GOV.UK The UK House Price Index is a National Statistic that shows changes in the value of residential properties in England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

[Doc 3](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/datasets/ukhousepriceindexmonthlypricestatistics):
Dataset UK House Price Index: monthly price statistics Summary of UK House Price Index (HPI) price statistics covering England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland. Full UK HPI data are available on GOV.UK.

The links point towards official HM Land Registry datasets which might be more accurate. Direct access to such datasets would be best. Let's proceed with these official documents.
</think>
<search>direct link to HM Land Registry UK House Price Index dataset</search>

Search query: direct link to HM Land Registry UK House Price Index dataset
Result: [Doc 1](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry The UK House Price Index (HPI) uses house sales data from HM Land Registry, Registers of Scotland, and Land and Property Services Northern Ireland and is ...

[Doc 2](https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-house-price-index-reports):
UK House Price Index: reports - GOV.UK Reports for the UK House Price Index (UK HPI) for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, including in CSV format.

[Doc 3](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/doc/ukhpi):
UK House Price Index: About - Land Registry The UK house price index dataset is available in several forms from the HM Land Registry: interactively, using the UK House Price Index tool. This tool also ...
<search>downloadable CSV of UK House Price Index from HM Land Registry</search>

Search query: downloadable CSV of UK House Price Index from HM Land Registry
Result: [Doc 1](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry If you would like to download all of the UKHPI data in comma-separated (CSV) format, please see the UK House Price Index reports page. UK House Price Index ...

[Doc 2](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/uk-house-price-index-data-downloads-may-2025):
UK House Price Index: data downloads May 2025 - GOV.UK Download aggregated data behind the UK House Price Index (UK HPI), in CSV format. From: HM Land Registry; Published: 16 July 2025. Contents.

[Doc 3](https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-house-price-index-reports):
UK House Price Index: reports - GOV.UK Reports for the UK House Price Index (UK HPI) for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, including in CSV format. From: HM Land Registry; Published ...

Downloadable CSV appears to be available now, let’s assume it is up-to-date through April 2025.
</think>

<search>direct link to latest downloadable CSV UK House Price Index from HM Land Registry</search>

Search query: direct link to latest downloadable CSV UK House Price Index from HM Land Registry
Result: [Doc 1](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry If you would like to download all of the UKHPI data in comma-separated (CSV) format, please see the UK House Price Index reports page.

[Doc 2](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/uk-house-price-index-data-downloads-october-2025):
UK House Price Index: data downloads October 2025 - GOV.UK Download aggregated data behind the UK House Price Index (UK HPI), in CSV format. From: HM Land Registry; Published: 17 December 2025. Contents.

[Doc 3](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/browse):
House Price Statistics - Land Registry House price index by property status in. United Kingdom reveal · Download only house price index by property status in United Kingdom: download CSV/spreadsheet ...
<search>UK House Price Index dataset CSV link for Jan 2022 - Apr 2025</search>

Search query: UK House Price Index dataset CSV link for Jan 2022 - Apr 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/uk-house-price-index-data-downloads-january-2025):
UK House Price Index: data downloads January 2025 - GOV.UK UK House Price Index: data downloads January 2025. Download aggregated data behind the UK House Price Index (UK HPI), in CSV format.

[Doc 2](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/datasets/ukhousepriceindexmonthlypricestatistics):
Dataset UK House Price Index: monthly price statistics Summary of UK House Price Index (HPI) price statistics covering England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland. Full UK HPI data are available on GOV.UK.

[Doc 3](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/uk-house-price-index-for-april-2025/uk-house-price-index-summary-april-2025):
UK House Price Index summary: April 2025 - GOV.UK Average house prices in the 12 months to April 2025 increased in England to £286,000 (3.0%), increased in Wales to £210,000 (5.3%) and increased ...
<search>direct link to UK House Price Index CSV data from January 2022 to April 2025</search>

Search query: direct link to UK House Price Index CSV data from January 2022 to April 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/uk-house-price-index-data-downloads-april-2025):
UK House Price Index: data downloads April 2025 - GOV.UK UK House Price Index: data downloads April 2025. Download aggregated data behind the UK House Price Index (UK HPI), in CSV format.

[Doc 2](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry As of October 2025, the average house price in the UK is £269,862, and the index stands at 103.4. Property prices have fallen by 0.1% compared to the ...

[Doc 3](https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-house-price-index-reports):
UK House Price Index: reports - GOV.UK Reports for the UK House Price Index (UK HPI) for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, including in CSV format.
